website_summaries.verdict: One of the nicest features of this product is the wide handles with silicone grips that make it easy to get in and out of the oven.
pros: Nonstick coating helps muffins come out of the pan easily
Quality construction from a trusted name
Orange edges brighten up a normally drab kitchen product
cons: The little silicone handles on this pan make it difficult to stack with other items in storage

customer_reviews.title: NOT dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: The website says "dishwasher safe", the product says "although this bakeware is dishwasher safe, hand washing is recommended. Do not use dishwasher detergent tablets". This is NOT dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D

customer_reviews.title: Best bakeware! Eggs dont stick!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bakeware is FANTASTIC! I baked breakfast muffins (eggs, bacon, cheese) and they were cooked to perfection. If you have ever baked eggs before, they create a hard crust on the pan that is impossible to get off without damaging the pan. I DIDNT use oils or sprays and the eggs slipped out of the pan with NO egg stuck on it. I am so thrilled with the ease of use and cleaning and bought 6 more pieces. Love my new bakeware!
customer_reviews.author: WH1984

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction, Easy Clean Up, and Nice Handles
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of buying branded bakeware, but I have to admit this is a high quality tin. I like the solid feel of the tin--there's no flex. It is also very comfortable to move around because of the extended handles on the ends. Super easy to clean as well, which is a big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: C J Petes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I bought this to replace an embarrassing old muffin tin that was so discolored it looked dirty even when clean. No such problem here. These clean up so easily, and those (intentionally) overgrown muffin-top edges release without having to worry with spraying down the pan before filling. I've already bought a few other pieces of bakeware in the Rachel Ray brand and will be adding more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeonista

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this muffin pan! I've used it twice now, and my muffins came out perfectly leaving nothing behind. I did very lightly spray with Pam, but that probably would not have been necessary. This is the first Rachel Ray product I have tried, but I will definitely be trying more. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I love Rachel Ray's line
customer_reviews.text: Her pans are so easy to handle and clean. I can't brag enough. Throwing out my others as I replace them with these for all my cupcakes, Mini's and otherwise. The cake comes out clean with or without liners and they are light (not heavy and dense like some of the more professional metal pans, although I consider these of professional quality. The outside measures about 10 1/2 X 17 1/12.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A. Causey

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clean Up with Jr Baker
customer_reviews.text: Got this to do baking projects with my 2 year-old granddaughter. Well you can imagine what a mess that might be. Our first project, with batter and streusal topping splattered everywhere, I was sure this muffin pan would need a good long soak to remove baked on over spill. Nope. The baked on bit on the top rinsed off immediately, scrubbing not needed.. The little muffins came out great. We used paper mini muffin cup liners. Adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a baker for 20 years now, and it was time to buy some new cupcake pans (I recently threw some out because they were really old). I found these and it arrived just as pictured. I love the silicone grips on either side, whose are a welcome feature! The grips really help keep the pans steady while pulling them out of the oven. I also bought the regular sized cupcake tray and I'm thrilled with both! I've used them 3 or 4 times each and was happy to see that everything cooked evenly and came out great! I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Muffin Tins
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these because my girlfriend said she wanted to make muffins and cupcakes and what boyfriend would I be if I didn't allow her to cook for me? Probably a bad one! LOL They arrived on time and have been very easy to use (so she says). While I don't see the point of the red handles on the sides, these are great muffin tins. They are durable, easy to clean (I wash them when she cooks), and the muffins come out really easily (without the need of using those paper muffin cups). Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED RIGHT OUT OF THE SHIPPING BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: Really upset. Just received this and when I took it out of the box the one corner already had a chunk of the coating chipped out of it. Now I have to take time out of my schedule to return the item and wait for a replacement. The replacement should be sent to me first and when I get it and make sure all is good with it THEN I will return the original damaged one 😠😠😠
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Rusts
customer_reviews.text: First wash = rust. All along the seam underneath, it just fills up with water. Sad, because these seem really solid otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Good
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this pan. I've used it twice with no additional spray or anything so far. The muffins tend to get a tad overdone so you may have to adjust the baking time down a little. I like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan so much! I have another pan similar to this, but just some no name brand. There is a marked difference. This pan is so easy to clean and the muffins pop right out. I've used it probably at least 4-5 times so far and it's still working great! (I had read some review that it only was easy to get muffins out the first time, but that has not been my experience)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Great mini muffin pan
customer_reviews.text: Great mini muffin pan. Haven't had to use baking spray or liner cups and the muffins bake evenly and pop right out. I bought this because, unlike most pans, it has handles, which makes it 100x easier to grab out of a hot oven. Good for bite size baking (I mostly make quinoa-veggie bites etc. rather than cupcakes). Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: After years of having mismatched cupcake pans that didn’t properly stack for storage, we upgraded. These pans seem great so far. We made muffins and they baked evenly and as expected. The muffins came out of the pans cleanly. They are easy to clean, but there is a ledge around the top that could allow build up over time. After trying these cupcake pans, I’m planning to invest in a few more pieces of this Rachel Ray set to upgrade some of my other baking dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: The only muffin tin you need!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! I have gone through a variety of muffin tins and I've learned they are not created equal. This muffin tin is very easy to clean as the muffins slid right out without sticking to the pan. I did not use paper liners either! The cook was even across the pan so all the muffins were done baking at the same time. The material is sturdy so I expect it to last me a while. Also, the little rubber handle detail was thoughtful when handling the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and non-stick coating!
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest muffin/baking pans I have ever had! Made nut cups and they easily came right out of the pans after cooking. Looking forward to making other things in them. The handles are really nice, and the 24 capacity is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Pan - Popovers Just Fall Out
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a muffin pan that was remotely as non-stick as this one is. The pan is a pretty good size, so in a pinch you can put two side by side in the oven. The handles are, well, handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, cupcake wells are very, very shallow
customer_reviews.text: The baking pan worked fine, and the side handles are very helpful. These are very shallow mini cupcakes, very shallow! My only complaint is I would have preferred a light colored pan, since things bake better in the lighter color, but I knew it was dark when I ordered it, so I am not changing my rating because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Best Small Cupcake Tin
customer_reviews.text: These make the perfect snackable cupcakes so you don't eat too much! We eat a couple, then freeze the rest. The tins are truly non-stick (no papers needed). And we like the little silicone handles. We use one of those little scoops to fill the small portions.
customer_reviews.author: MBel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the quality of this pan! As expected from Rachael Ray products, the quality is superb. Used it to make some individual egg cups and they just slid right out when done, unlike my other muffin pan! Would buy this again, as well as other RR products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pan
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this pan several times. I added a picture of these delicious vanilla cupcakes with French butter cream frosting that I used the pan for. It cooks everything fairly evenly. I found that with all of my Rachel Ray bakeware the bottom seems to brown a bit more than I’d like. But besides that I have no complaints. It does what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Keilstrup

customer_reviews.title: Nice orange silicone brightens these pans! Love 'em and bought more in the set. Can't go wrong with Rachel Ray
customer_reviews.text: I love the Rachel Ray pans. Let's face it all these plans are pretty much the same, but I love the extra room at the edges of the pans to lift them out of the oven, so your fingers/hands don't go into the batter. And most especially, I love the orange silicone at the edges of the pans. It really brightens up an otherwise drab pan. Love it and bought other pieces in the set too!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best cupcake tins
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this cupcake tin. This is my second time purchasing it. They are so easy to use and clean. The non-stick material is one of the best. You can wipe any excess, caked-on batter right off with just your finger. I'll probably buy more in the future. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: STOP THINKING ABOUT IT AND JUST BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to make mini muffins for my toddler and I am in love with this pan. It is so perfect that cooking spray is NOT needed EVER to prevent things from sticking. Now I just need the one for regular sized muffins and cupcakes.... Definitely worth every penny and then some
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very non-stick
customer_reviews.text: The muffins release really well. I still use cooking spray, but even spilled batter doesn't stick. Cleans up well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Started to peel
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this pan because I liked the design but I noticed twice that I when I used this in the oven, it peeled from the bottom some sort of plastic fell at the bottom of the oven and with the heat ended up dissolving in my oven. I had to scrub hard to get it out. I’m not sure if perhaps maybe I just got a bad one since most of the reviews on here are 5-stars? :/ Sadly, I had to dispose of this.
customer_reviews.author: Diana O.

customer_reviews.title: You gotta love Rachel Ray
customer_reviews.text: I received a set of Rachel Ray's baking pan sets in the past as a gift. I never had an issue with her pans, so I bought this to add to the set. Of course, no problem. It works perfectly. I was nervous about warping (which happened with another non-Rachel Ray pan of mine...), but it works well. I wish I bought my baking sheet from Rachel Ray too instead of the other one...!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Park

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I have had my fair share of muffin pans and im not even a remotely good baker. I like things quick and easy and this pan does just that. It baked whatever very nicely and even when my cupcakes over flow and bake onto the pan, they still easily comes out!
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these pans
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these! The extended handles on the end make them easier to get in/out of the oven without sticking your thumb into your baked goods. The silicone piece adds some “grip” when pulling them out. The silicone piece is contoured so the pans stack really well together. I’ve used them a few times this week and I am happy with how it bakes evenly and is easy enough to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this, and use it at least once to twice a week. I do very lightly give it a spritz with Pam, but that may be unnecessary. Muffins slide out of the pan so easily, and nothing sticks--not even when I make blueberry muffins. It's a breeze to clean. I have not put it into the dishwasher as it works so beautifully and is so easy to clean manually that I don't want to take a chance on spoiling the non-stick finish. I have one in both the 12 cup and six cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan is awesome! It is easy to clean and muffins slide right out. Love the look of the blue silicon handles. The pan is really great quality. You will be happy you bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a baker for 20 years now, and it was time to buy some new cupcake pans (I recently threw some out because they were really old). I found these and it arrived just as pictured. I love the silicone grips on either side, whose are a welcome feature! The grips really help keep the pans steady while pulling them out of the oven. I also bought the miniature sized cupcake tray and I'm thrilled with both! I've used them 3 or 4 times each and was happy to see that everything cooked evenly and came out great! I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: The grips are a really great feature for removing baked goods from the oven. I paired this item with silicone muffin cups, and together, clean up is simple and paper waste is reduced—win/win.
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT FOR TOASTER OVERN
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be able to bake cupcakes in my toaster oven and it is perfect for that so you don't have to heat up the whole house with the oven. Easy to clean and fits either way in the toaster oven!
customer_reviews.author: Quilter

customer_reviews.title: If you bake frequently, this is NOT the muffin pan for you
customer_reviews.text: I bake a great deal and this tin does not stand the test of time. I've owned it for a few months and now food sticks to it, impossible to scrub off even after hot water dishwasher and hand wash and steel wool. Now need to throw it out. I have other non stick pans that I use frequently that stand up over time, sadly this one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie C

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy pan, and easy to use and clean, will definitely buy again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great. Worth the little extra for the name. I usually don't pay for a name when buying things. But I do for baking stuff with Rachel Ray. Cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful addition for an bakers repertoire. I love the silicone side handles and the non-stick surface. This is a product that will definitely pay for itself because it is very well made. I personally own several other Rachael Ray kitchen items and I have no complaints. Will continue to purchase items in this line.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Stofko

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how well this would work but it is the best muffin pan I have owned. Great nonstick surface
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Muffins galore!!!
customer_reviews.text: Again, my daughter likes to bake so I bought her a muffin tin. Makes muffins, what can I say? Easy to clean. Orange handles are pretty I guess. Buy one and ask your kids to make you muffins. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B. single father and family shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great muffin pan!
customer_reviews.text: What an upgrade from my last muffin pan! I've used this about 10 times now for meal prepping eggs and nothing sticks. (Note: I am careful not to scratch the pan and use the soft side of the sponge for cleaning.)
customer_reviews.author: Frank Da Tank

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy pan!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Rachel Ray pan I have bought as I don't watch her or know much about her but I really like this pan, I thought it was very durable and a bit heavy which I like. I gifted it to my Mother in law and she loves it, says it is one of the best muffin pans she has owned!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent muffin pan!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pan! It is totally nonstick without any cooking spray and it cooks things very evenly. Also clean up as a snap!
customer_reviews.author: pauline matson

customer_reviews.title: Good Muffin Tin - Not amazing
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan unbelievable nonstick for the first few times using it but afterwards it was just like any other non stick pan - some muffins stick and some don't.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great Non-Stick Muffin Tins
customer_reviews.text: Love these muffin tins! I have had one of them for about 5 years now, and just purchased a second one! I often use them with liners for cupcakes/muffins which are super easy, but even when I opt not to use liners they are incredibly easy to clean. A little hot water and any stuck on items come immediately free from the non-stick surface!
customer_reviews.author: Aryn L.

customer_reviews.title: Best muffin pan ever!
customer_reviews.text: Rachael Ray did it again! This is by far the best muffin pan! So easy to clean, I just love it. Thanks for shipping so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan is great! The picture was after I just made corn muffins in it. It cleaned very easily. Also very sturdy. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DeRozier

customer_reviews.title: Food stuck so bad I had to throw away the pan
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan 1 time for some egg bites. I sprayed the pan with non stick spray and added the egg mixture with ham and cheese. Every egg muffin was stuck to the pan so bad that I could only get them out in pieces. I soaked the pan for hours with soap and still the food was not coming out. I regrettably threw away the pan in haste instead of contacting the company. I am still on the look out for a nice non stick muffin pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect muffins and easy cleanup!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan!! We make tons of muffins in this house. I do still spray with cooking spray of habit but it’s likely not necessary to have hw muffins come out clean. I don’t even do a rinse just put in dish washer and it comes out perfectly clean! The muffins cook very well never been burnt or stuck to the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: I've used this only a few times but it is definitely nonstick and high quality. The edges are easy to grab and it works great - no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Rach9276

customer_reviews.title: Yummo!
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Rachael Ray! My husband bought me one of her cookie sheets after he ruined one of mine. That was my first Rachael product. I love the weight and the easy easy clean up. The mini muffin tin is no exception. It is strong and sturdy and cleans up in a jiffy. I will buy more R. R. products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SassyPants

customer_reviews.title: Rachel Ray bakeware is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colored silicone handles and these are 100% non-stick cookware. These are the easiest bakeware to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely other mini muffin pans on the market that are less money! But you truly get what you pay for with this muffin pan! It is very sturdy, cooked my mini muffins great, and I love the red grips to hold onto! Great quality and great value for your money !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy and good, but when in the heated oven it gives strong heated rubber smell, that's why I actually do not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Yuliya

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made muffin tin. Perfect for just a few muffins or cupcakes. We're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: marquis

customer_reviews.title: Decent pan
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice little cupcake pan but after the 1st use everything started getting stuck. It cleans very easy though. If used with liners, it’s great.. not so great with out.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Mandac

customer_reviews.title: Great cupcake pans!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for someone who said they are really easy to care for. Muffins and cupcakes don't stick in the pan. Well made and a nice size! I purchased two of these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these for about a year now and they have held up well to repeated baking and washing in a dishwasher/ Cupcakes do not easily burn, and are relatively easy to get out. What more can you ask for from a non stick cupcake pan?!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. EckmanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This will be my go-to muffin pan....
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this twice now for popover muffins and each time, they came out perfect. The pan didn't warp in the oven and the muffins slid out without any sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Must have! Make and bake your meatballs!
customer_reviews.text: This product is made well and I just made meatballs in it and baked them! Wow they were fabulous! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, non-stick works great.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, easy to clean, and the non-stick works great. Would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Quality pan
customer_reviews.text: Quality pan, good construction... very useful and easy to clean. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for omelet bites
customer_reviews.text: This cupcake pan is so good! I bought it to make breakfast omelet bites, it worked so well. Nothing got stuck to the pan and the bites popped right out! Definitely will be purchasing another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick bakeware. I’ve used it several times already and it’s stick non-stick. Can’t complain. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses, they no longer perform very well as non-stick. Keep some spray oil on handy, you'll need it sooner than you like.
customer_reviews.author: August Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Rust!
customer_reviews.text: It has rust only after 1 month of use!! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica egbert

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully. Baked lots of mini cupcakes for my sister's birthday and they were delightful
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't they have these a few years ago?
customer_reviews.text: So I got tired of having a big chunk of my dishwasher or oven spave taken up by a 12 muffin pan when I often only need to cook 4-5 muffins for my family at a time. Purchased this as a solution, and it works great. Works like any normal muffin pan would, just 1/2 the muffin count. It's not truly 1/2 size due to the pan being a little long to accomodate the handle grips. However, still much smaller than 12 muffin pan and solves the issue of taking up unnecessary dishwasher and oven space.
customer_reviews.author: R. Certain

customer_reviews.title: No need to look further really
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for baking muffins. Very easy to hold and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: MINI!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please note that these are the MINI muffin size! Its not a huge issue for me, im still going to use it but I was under the impression they were the larger size. I could have easily looked over that but I just wanted anyone else to be aware when purchasing. Other than that, they seem to be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rees

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I bother buttering this tray, the quality is so good, muffins slip right out. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: DaniB

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and will clean up nice
customer_reviews.text: Have not used to this yet but no it will be perfect and easy to
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Mini Muffins
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to make homemade mini muffins for snack time. Love the Rachael Ray orange grips.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Great bakeware to have!
customer_reviews.text: My mother absolutely loved this cupcake pan! She used it right after it was delivered and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: S D Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love the handles
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grip handles makes getting muffins out of the oven much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Angeal

customer_reviews.title: cook evenly and quickly and the clean up is so easy. Will be buying more of her stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have really been surprised with a lot of the Rachael Ray cooking line. High quality, cook evenly and quickly and the clean up is so easy. Will be buying more of her stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonder
customer_reviews.text: This muffin pan is AWESOME! Received it in record breaking time, which considering the circumstances of the virus, was really great. Made muffins this morning, came out beautifully and cleanup was quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Atocha B.

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: Says that it is a good pan. Nothing special, but a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mjsjr

customer_reviews.title: Best pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan, it is truly non stick, and I use it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Rachael Ray pans are great
customer_reviews.text: I own a whole a set and love every single item of it. The muffin pan is perfect, just because it really a "nonstick" pan.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenchen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got has a Christmas gift. Wish I have 2 of them. Used Christmas day for party appetizer, nothing stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Owen

customer_reviews.title: Well made !
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Bakers dozen ! Very easy to clean and very well made !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I like this pan
customer_reviews.text: Cupcake pan is well made, high quality, and I like the silicone “handles”
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan! Make sure you follow the directions for dark or non-stick pans, or lower the temperature by 25 degrees and use the lowest time recommended. If I bake exactly per package directions my muffins come out a little too brown.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by the Muffin Lady!
customer_reviews.text: I have been making muffins for 38 years pretty regularly. These are great muffin pans, the best I have ever owned! I still use a liner because I usually wrap and freeze them individually so they are easy to grab on the run.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly non-stick
customer_reviews.text: However much I oil this, my muffins tend to stick really badly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate_Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It’s very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made muffin pan. Easy to clean easy to remove muffins. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Debdzo

customer_reviews.title: Love these muffin tins! Love Rachael Ray!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and it’s so easy to clean! I’ve made both savory and sweet items and they don’t stick to the pans. Such a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer Bakeware!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan for perfect muffins every time. No non stick spray should be used. No cup cake paper liners needed either. Muffins come out golden brown when cooked in dry pan. Immediately hand wash cool pan in soapy water and you will get a lifetime of great muffins from this pan. The quality of the different Rachael Ray kitchen items I own is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: PIRATE40

customer_reviews.title: Great bakeware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cookie sheets a year ago and loved them so much that I bought my daughter, who loves to bake, the cookie sheet set and muffin bakeware!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, non sticky
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this pan although i wanted it a little smaller. It is non-sticky and easy to clean it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a muffin pan....nothing much else to say
customer_reviews.text: We have a few other Rachael Ray products which we like mainly because they are orange which is a household favorite color. In general this has held up well, heats evenly, and does exactly what you would expect. The one item to note is that the orange on the handle is purely decorative. I had hoped it would stay cool so that you can pull the try out of the oven without an oven mitt, but that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: They are nice, durable, and incredibly easy to clean!!! Would love more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Burkey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old muffin pan with this one! Couldn't be more satisfied! Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great muffin tins
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it does give you a smaller size muffin, just like I wanted. The size is just right; not a mini size. This is about the 4th product I purchased from Rachel Ray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST MUFFIN PAN I HAVE EVER USED. Nonstick quality, even after sitting overnight. Always cooks perfectly. Easy to grab with the rubber ends. Love this pan so much.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Easy care
customer_reviews.text: I made muffins and nothing stuck at all. I like the easy grip handles also
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products it is as it is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product nice and heavy metal non-stick has good rubber handles are good I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Michael A

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans. So far they’re great
customer_reviews.text: Nice pans. So far they’re great. The not stick is holding up and we’ve had these for a few years now.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Yum -o Nonstick Bakeware 12-Cup Muffin Tin With Grips / Nonstick 12-Cup Cupcake Tin With Grips - 12 Cup, Gray
product_meta.description: Color:Gray with Orange Grips| Size:12-CupWhip up some yummy morning muffins for breakfast, followed by Rachael’s S’mores Cupcakes for later, in the Rachael Ray Yum-o! Nonstick Bakeware 12-Cup Oven Lovin' Muffin and Cupcake Pan. This versatile muffin and cupcake pan is made from heavy gauge steel that resists warping and is oven safe to 500°F. For easy cleanup, the muffin pan has long-lasting nonstick for excellent food release, so making everyone’s favorite home-baked goodies is even more fun. This nonstick 12-cup cupcake pan also features grippy handles for a confident grasp when pulling a batch of her Raspberry Jam Streusel Muffins from the oven. As an added bonus, a portion of the proceeds from this purchase goes to Yum-o!, Rachael’s nonprofit organization that helps kids and their parents develop healthy relationships with food and cooking.
feature_bullets: DURABLE MUFFIN AND CUPCAKE PAN: This 12-cup nonstick muffin and cupcake pan is made from heavy gauge steel for everyday use; sturdy construction resists warping
ENHANCED NONSTICK BAKEWARE PAN: Muffin pan features long-lasting nonstick for excellent food release and easy cleanup
EASY HANDLING MUFFIN PAN: Grippy pan handles offer a confident grasp
SOME LIKE IT HOT: Muffin pan is oven safe to 500 degrees F for making savory single quiches and mini casseroles
FEEL GOOD BAKEWARE: A portion of proceeds goes to Yum-o!, Rachael’s nonprofit organization that helps kids and their parents develop healthy relationships with food
